verses.verse: Praise in the Night A Song of Ascents. (1 Chr 9.33; Ps 103.21) Come, bless the LORD, all you servants of the LORD, who stand by night in the house of the LORD!
(Ps 28.2; 1 Tim 2.8) Lift up your hands to the holy place, and bless the LORD.
May the LORD, maker of heaven and earth, bless you from Zion.
